mapper.insert: insert into base_menu (id, code, name, parent_id, node_type, icon_url, level, is_deleted, sort, link_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nodeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update base_menu set code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, node_type = #{nodeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, parent_id, node_type, icon_url, level, is_deleted, sort, link_url from base_menu
